outputs.output_descr: Contributes to the creation and maintenance of a secure and peaceful environment, especially for the poor and marginalized, addressing conflict prevention and peacebuilding, small arms recovery and reduction, disarmament and demobilization

project_descr: Policy and capacity building programme in support of the 2005-2011 UNDAF Outcome on the promotion of the Culture of Peace and human security
project_title: Conflict Prevention and Peace Building Programme
